sec.div: Changes in relative soil water content under warming and varying water
sec.p: Under the same temperature treatment, the changes in SRWC were associated with water regimes in the four Stipa plants (Figure 2). Under every temperature treatment, increased water treatments (W3 and W4) were in favor of increasing SRWC, but decreased water reduced SRWC. Likewise, SRWC decreased with increased temperature under the same water treatment in the four species (Figure 2).

div.p: Changes in soil relative water content of the four Stipa plants under different temperature and water treatments. Vertical bars represent ± SE of the mean ( n = 6). (a) S. breviflora, (b) S. bungeana, (c) S. grandis, (d) S. baicalensis
